title: Superhuman
description: Save the world and become a Superhuman with over 70 animations and over 4 AimSpaces
longDescription:
Preview: https://youtu.be/adduu8aS42g

Update 01: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aH58c_WRYzk

This pack will give you the animations to create a super powered character for your games. With animations for Telepathy, Telekinesis, Eye-blasts and more, you can create the hero you need for any situation. This pack will include regular updates which will add more diverse abilities (e.g. Super strength, ice slide, etc...). Within this pack you will find AimSpaces for Telekenisis, Telepathy, Eye-blast (each with 9 positions) and Shock-blast (with 3 positions) as well as blendspaces for each one. Also you will see animations such as healing, energy shields, different push abilities and more. If this pack doesn't have it, let me know and I will look to adding it!

The world needs your help, are you willing to try to save it?

--------------------------------------------------------

OVERHAUL UPDATE! - (On its way, currently in review)

This update includes the following:

  1. About 40 animations get an updated version of the previous one. The original animations are still there so you won't have anything happen to your project when you update the pack. The new animations have '_UPDATED' at the end of the animation name.
  2. Updated skeleton. The previous skeleton had a bad setup of bones and had an extra bone that was not supposed to be there. This skeleton matches the Unreal Mannequin.
  3. About 30 new animations! These animations were to be in another pack, but I decided to put them inside of this one! These animations include new abilities as well as reaction animations.
technicalDetails:
Features/Abilities: Eye-blast, telekinesis, telepathy, heal, shock-blast, push, energy shield, nova, Smash,

Scaled to Epic skeleton: (Yes)

Rigged: (Yes)

Rigged to Epic skeleton: (Yes)

Animated: (Yes)

Number of Animations: over 175

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): 2/34

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: All

DISCORD: https://discord.gg/2qKgNCM
